article:
'Electroluminescent Displays' ('ELD's) are a type of Flat panel display created
by sandwiching a layer of electroluminescent material such as GaAs between two
layers of conductors. When current flows, the layer of material emits radiation
in the form of visible light. Electroluminescence (EL) is an optical and
electrical phenomenon where a material emits light in response to an electric
current passed through it, or to a strong electric field.
